title: Snipster – write snippets once, no json/xml/cson
author: jhanstra
content: readme.md snipster · publish of snippets all your editors one command.write arrange snippets file, rather tediously hand-editing 1000-line json/cson/xml files. meta content.install & set-yarn global add snipster-- --npm install -g snipstersnipster init it workswrite snippets you normally write code - don't worry wrangling into json xml object, rewriting for every text editor use, quoting every single line, escaping tabs new lines, indenting, etc. leave of complexity snipster. name your snippet file is prefix use call .the file extension your snippet file is language scope under the snippet be used. fancy multi-scope extensions 'html+md+txt' will the snippet available several scopes, use named shortcut extensions 'all' 'style' use snippet all file types all similar style file types (css, less, scss), respectively. content the file is snippet body, exactly will appear you type prefix tab. tab stop fields ($1, $2) placeholders (${1:placeholder}) like would normally.examples many more examples inspiration, the creator's snippets directory.hipsum.mdman bun mumblecore bicycle rights next level, distillery scenester fanny pack art party master cleanse.rcc.jsexport default class $1 extends react.component { constructor(props) { super(props) } render () { return ( $2 ) }}$1.proptypes = { $3};doctype.html<!doctype html><html lang="en"> <head> <meta charset="utf-8"> <title>$1</title> <meta name="description" content="$2"> <meta name="author" content="$3"> <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1"> <link rel="stylesheet" href="$4"> <!--[ lt ie 9]> <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/html5shiv/3.7.3/html5shiv.js"></script> <![endif]--> </head> <body> $5 </body></html>supportsnipster currently supports vscode, atom, sublime mac . support windows more editors should coming soon - suggestions contributions welcome. language scopes text editors support are theoretically supported, please submit issues any are working.disclaimersnipster is at 1.0 level yet. has been tested on creator's machine far. you snippets already your text editors, is recommended back up before running snipster, in case. however, snipster does backing and transferring, if goes you shouldn't need worry anything. anything does wrong you, please submit issue! :)apisnipster init set with snipster telling where snippets are which text editors use. snipster transfer your editors' pre-existing snippets.snipster publishpublish of snippets your directory your text editors. running , you should able use of snippets across editor.options:[editor(s)] - optional - publish to certain editors passing as arguments, e.g. snipster publish atom snipster publish code.snipster add [snippet name]add snippet your directory the command line publish your editors. will open default editor ( vi) where can write body the snippet.options:[snippet name] - required - prefix file extension the snippet add (e.g. lorem.js)[path] - optional - folder path within snippets directory place snippet (e.g. javascript)snipster listlist of snippets your directory.options:[language] - optional - filter language scope, e.g. snipster list js snipster list md.snipster helpalias snipster --help. provides details how use snipster.list named extensions:: all languagesstyle: css + scss + lesscomparisonlet's add snippet called 'hipsum' writes hipster-flavored lorem ipsum our editor inside markdown files .in vs code (code/user/snippets/markdown.json)"hipster ipsum": { "prefix": "hipsum", "body": [ "man bun mumblecore bicycle rights next level, distillery scenester fanny pack art party master cleanse." ], "description": "hipster-flavored filler text"},... of other snippets ... atom (.atom/snippets.cson)'.source.gfm': 'hipster ipsum': prefix: "hipsum" body: "man bun mumblecore bicycle rights next level, distillery scenester fanny pack art party master cleanse." ... of other snippets ... sublime (sublime/packages/user/hipsum.sublime-snippet)<snippet><tabtrigger>hipsum</tabtrigger><scope>text.html.markdown</scope><content><![cdata[man bun mumblecore bicycle rights next level, distillery scenester fanny pack art party master cleanse.]]></content></snippet> snipster (hipsum.md) running snipster publish, hipsum is available all our text editors.man bun mumblecore bicycle rights next level, distillery scenester fanny pack art party master cleanse.contribute donatecontributions are welcome enormously helpful. submit feature ideas, issues, pull requests, etc. you find value snipster please feel free buy a :)
